Html: sinners confesion ring  IS In heroic only. but if you use the filters on rawr it says it is avalible on normal. This is not right!

The Rawr database seems to be mostly generated from armory at the moment.    If you update the item from WowHead it should fix it.    If you find issue on several items, then updating the whole item cache from WowHead might be a good idea, but I find that this long since the patch, most of the items are pretty accurate.
